name: Mix it Up
desc: You are unable to make ranged attacks for the next 1d6 rounds

name: Aim Carefully Next Time
desc: For 3 rounds, you must spend a full round action to make a single attack

name: Don't Hit Me!
desc: For 3 rounds, you take an additional -2 penalty on ranged attacks for each ally in melee combat with your target

name: Phantom Wind
desc: You compensate for a breeze which isn't there. You take -2 penalty on ranged attack rolls for 3 rounds

name: Recoil
desc: You move backward 1 square and fall prone

name: Amazing Miss
desc: You are stunned for 1 round (Fort negates)

name: Not My Pony
desc: Your attack hits the nearest allied animal or mount

name: Double Miss
desc: You use twice as much ammunition on this attack

name: Close to the Ear
desc: You are deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal Check)

name: Insecure
desc: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls for 1d4 rounds or until you score a critical hit

name: In the Line of Fire
desc: Your attack hits the nearest ally and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit

name: Lowered Guard
desc: You provoke attacks of opportunity from all threatening foes

name: Weapon Jam
desc: If using a projectile weapon it does not function. Spend 1 standard action to clear

name: Um, oops
desc: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target

name: What are the Odds?
desc: If you made a thrown attack, you hit the target, but the weapon ends up in the target's possession

name: Lost Grip
desc: You can only take a move action next round

name: Pinch in Parts
desc: You take 1d6 points of damage

name: So much Blood
desc: You are sickened for 1d6 rounds

name: Huh?
desc: You are confused for 1 round

name: Seeing Double
desc: All your attacks have a 50% miss chance for 1 round

name: Misjudged the distance
desc: All attack rolls beyond the first ranged increment have triple the normal distance penalty for 3 rounds

name: Overcompensate
desc: All targets with cover gain an additional +4 bonus to AC against you for 3 rounds

name: Friendly Fire
desc: Your attack hits your ally closest to the target

name: Lost the Target
desc: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round

name: Shot Your Foot
desc: You take 1d2 points of Dex damage and your speed is reduced by half until healed

name: Overthrow
desc: If attack was made with a thrown weapon, the weapon travels 5 times its range increment in a random direction

name: Tunnel Vision
desc: For the next 3 rounds, you have a +1 bonus on attack rolls, but you flat-footed

name: All Thumbs
desc: You lose your Dex bonus on attack rolls for 3 rounds

name: Bull's Eye
desc: Your shot ricochets and hits you near the eye. You are blinded for 1 round

name: Bad Alignment
desc: You take -4 penalty on all attacks with this weapon until repaired (DC 20 Craft check)

name: Cracked
desc: Your weapon (not ammunition) takes 1d6 points of damage, ignoring hardness

name: Whoops!
desc: You are knocked prone

name: Tied Up
desc: You become entangled in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself

name: Sprain
desc: You take 1d4 points of Dex damage

name: Nicked
desc: You take 1 point of bleed

name: Klutz
desc: You drop your weapon

name: Spilled Ammo
desc: Your ammunition falls from its container and takes 1d6 rounds to gather up

name: Head Rush
desc: You are sickened for 1d4 rounds

name: My Spleeny Bits!
desc: You take 1 point of Con damage

name: Notched Fingers
desc: You take 1d6 points of bleed

name: Torn Tendon
desc: You take 1 point of Dex bleed

name: Broken
desc: Your weapon is destroyed (Ref negates). Magic weapons use their own save bonus (DMG 214)

name: Everything you Got
desc: You are exhausted (Fort negates)

name: Snapped String
desc: If attack was made with a bow or crossbow, the string breaks and requires 1d3 round to fix

name: Wrong Weapon
desc: If you made a thrown attack, you throw a random object from your gear

name: Archer's Elbow
desc: You take a -2 penalty on all ranged attack rolls for 1d4 minutes

name: Wide Open
desc: You are flat-footed for 1 round

name: Backfire
desc: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target

name: Errant Aim
desc: Reroll attack against creature nearest the target (yourself excluded)

name: You'll Shoot Your Eye Out
desc: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit

name: Arching Back
desc: You are fatigued

name: Awkward Attack
desc: You take -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds
